She was taking that class for she wanted to have something to go back on if becoming a nurse doesn’t work out for her.

1311122112.content:
At the end of her 6th month, Chiku was taken in for her monthly exam. She got into the examination room and lay down on the bed. The doctor came in and started the ultrasound. She looked at the twins inside Chiku and told her that they are doing fine, growing steadily and there is nothing to worry about. Chiku smiled and rubbed her belly.

“That’s strange, this never happened before.” The doctor said.

“What is it? Is one of my babies not going to be born properly?” Chiku asked.

“Your babies are fine, they are multilypying.”

Chiku was confused by this and looked at the ultrasound and saw what she meant. Chiku then felt her belly beginning to expand as her 2 babies became 4, then 8, 16, 32, and so on. Chiku watched her belly grow bigger and bigger in front of her and the doctor watched in horror. When her babies stopped multiplying, the doctor took another loon and told Chiku the news.

“Well Miss Chiku, it appears that you have about 48 babies in you. It also looks like if they multiply anymore, your womb will explode instantly.” The doctor said.

Chiku got up and looked at hall her babies in on the ultrasound. Chiku told the doctor when she gives birth, she will keep 2 of them and give up the rest for adoption. The doctor agreed and had Chiku sign couple papers for putting up 46 of her babies when they are born. When finished, Chiku went home.
1311122112.title: Chiku's babies start to multiply inside her.

13111221122.content:
Chiku continued on with her life while she waited for her children to come out. The last 3 months came and went and she was ready to burst if they don't come out soon. She was massive with 48 babies in her and has a hard time getting around with this. The last couple weeks of her pregnacny in the hospital while they were getting everything ready for her birth. Her mother was there with her when it began.

"Here we go. Glad we're keeping only 2." Shinku said.

"Definitely. I don't think I can take care of 48 children." Chiku said.

It took hours upon hours before each and every one of her children were born. It felt as if her heart stopped from the stress and actually did for a short while. When she came through a couple days later, she saw a crip with 2 of the 48 next to her. That was great and hoped the other 46 get a good family and raised right. She would do the same thing with these 2 and possibly more in time.

When she got out of her bath, Chiku's mother came into her room.

"Mother, don't just come barging in like that! I'm naked and almost just gave birth!" Chiku said.

"It's not like I've seen you naked before. Listen, after what happened this season and how many times you almost go hit, I decided to pull you out of school." Shinku said.

"That's good, it was getting hard to go to school with these little ones in me."

Chiku got got into her favorite t-shirt and jeans and went out for the evening. She went to the mall to meet up with some old friends. They went around the mall looking for some great new things. Normally Chiku would get things for herself but didn't. A rush of people came and Chiku got sepperated from her friends. She wondered around and ended up in the food court. She looked ther for a while and soon gave up.

"Free sample miss?" a female asked.

Chiku turned and saw a girl about a couple years older than her holding a tray of donuts. They all looked really good and the girl told her she can have them all. Chiku ate the whole tray and the girl brought out another. She kept bringing out tray after tray and Chiku kept eating them. When she was stuffed, Chiku thanked her and went to find the maternity store. There was a sale going on and Chiku got a couple new clothes. She then went to the baby store near by and got some clothes when her daughters are born.

1311122121.content:
It was a warm summer afternoon like any other and Chiku was up on her bedroom window seal reading a book. She normall keeps her mid back length black hair tied up but she decided to keep it undone. On top of that, she was wearing her glasses that she never really wears much to see and kind of likes them. She was wearing a bikini top and jeans on so that her belly could rest on le lap and exposed to the world. While she read, her bedroom door opened and Mae came in.

"Since you became pregnant, you really have became calmer and gentle." Mae said.

"I know, I never thought being a mother can be so life changing." Chiku said.

"Everyone at school is worried about you and wanted to know if your ever coming back."

Chiku told her that she won't be returning to school for her mother pulled her out and will continue her education at home. Mae told her that she even looks more motherly with her hair down and her glasses on. Mae sat down behind Chiku and had her lean back against her. She then told her that later they are going to a party for her that some of their friends put together.

"Have you thought of a name for this little one?" Mae asked.

"I have thought that I would name one Asuka and the other one Rei." Chiku said.

"Wait, you're having twins?"

"I thought I told you a couple months ago."

"Just kidding, I knew this whole time. I knew that had to be the reason you're getting so huge."

Mae kissed Chiku on the check and helped into something nice. She had the pregnant mother-to-be into a nice lose blue and red dress and took her to the party.

When Chiku was in her 9th and final month, her belly had swollen up to the size of a beach ball. She felt like if her daughters got any bigger, she would explode. Chiku was longing on the couch when she felt her water break.

"Mom, I think their ready." Chiku said.

"Thats what you said the other day but turned out they weren't." Shinku said.

Shinku walked into the living room and saw water going down her daughters pants legs. She helped her up and into the car. They rushed to the hospital and Chiku into the maternity ward. It was going to be a while before they are born but Chiku was ready for this. Her mother stayed by her side and made her as comfortable as possible. When Chiku's daughters finally came out, Chiku held them in her arms and never wanted them to leave her.
13111221211.title: Chiku's babies are ready to be born

When Chiku’s daughters were 5, Chiku brought them to the park to have some fun. Asuka and Rei are always together. If they are ever separated, they freak out and try to get back together. Asuka is the dominate older sister that always protects her twin and Rei is the reserved sister that is always hiding behind Asuka. While at the park, Chiku sat on a nearby bench watching her daughters having fun. While watching them, Rei fell and didn’t get up. Asuka rushed to her side and tried to help her. Chiku watched as Asuka tried to help her twin up but Rei didn’t get up. Chiku rushed to her daughters to see what was wrong with Rei. When she got to her side, Rei’s breathing was faint and she was very blush. Chiku thought she was just dehydrated from the heat that day so she took Rei and Asuka home.

“You’ll be alright Rei, just hold on.” Chiku said as she cradled her daughter in her arms.

Rei held onto her mother’s shirt as they hurried home. Chiku laid Rei in her bed and Asuka held her hand. Chiku got some water and made sure it was cold. She propped her daughter up and had her drink it. Rei slowly drank the water and told her mother that she feels faint. Chiku looked her over and saw she had a big cut on her leg. She wrapped it with a towel to stop the bleeding before calling her mother. She told her that she will be there soon to take her to the hospital. Rei fell asleep and Chiku took her other daughter downstairs.

1311122121121.content:
After an month of being in the hospital, Rei makes a full recovery. She is unable to walk for the time being but Asuka didn't care. While Asuka was at school, Chiku didn't tell Asuka that her twin was coming home for she wanted it to be a surprise. It was mid afternoon and Chiku was released from school early and rushed over to the hospital. Asuka will be out of preschool in an hour which gave the girl enough time to prep her youngest daughter.

"Ready to go home and see Asuka?" Chiku asked.

When Rei heard her twins name, she perked up and was as happy as can be. Rei deeply loved Asuka as much as she loved her mother. Chiku picked up her daughter and checked her out of the hospital. Chiku told Rei to rest up in her arms on the way home for she has an afternoon planned full of fun for the twins. She got her home and changed her without waking her up. It was about time to get Asuka so Chiku grabbed Rei and a few things and dashed out the door. For not playing softball for some time now, Chiku still had her muscular legs and speed she had in high school. She got to the preschool that Asuka and Rei attend in time and waited for her other daughter to come out. By now, Rei has woken up and had her little head up against Chiku's chest listening to her heart beat. She loved how soft it was and hoped Asuka had a heart beat like that.

When Asuka came out, she saw Chiku with her twin in her arms and quickly ran over. Chiku picked her up and Asuka hugged her twin she was happy to see her twin happy and healthy again. Asuka took notice the bandage on her leg and was told to be careful.

"If it isn't Chiku." a voice called out.

Chiku turned around and saw her best friend Mae. She saw an adorable little girl clinging to her hand walking next to her.

"It's been forever Mae. Is this your sister?" Chiku asked.

"No, this is my little girl JJ. I had her a couple months after you left school." Mae said.

"There is no way this little fluff ball is your daughter. She's too cute for that and could easily pull of being good baby sister."

The girls talked and went to Mae's house. Mae told Chiku that if she wants, she could apply for the program that she's part of. The program pays an underaged mother $6,000 a week per child. Since Chiku had twins, she would be getting $16,000 a week. She will be getting full insurance including health and dental for her and her children and will be granted a $2,000 raise everytime she has another child whether she keeps them or not. Chiku was needing some money and got signed up. She was given $40,000 there to start off and wondered what to do. She wasn't required to have any formal education or a job giving her time to do what she wants. Mae told her that she could work part time at the cafe her mother opened up for her. Chiku took the job and was good to work during the day while their kids are in preschool.

13111221211212.content:
Chiku was working perfectly fine and happily at the café while her daughters are at preschool and is off when they are about out. Their school is a block away from the café so Asuka and Rei would come right there after school. This made Chiku happy and she ensured that when they got there, they got right onto what they need to do. When she got finished, she would help pack them up and they went home. With the money that she had made so far with the program she is in and working at the café, Chiku had gotten herself an apartment to live in.

“Momma, do we have to live here?” Asuka said.

“Well, grandma can’t take care of all of us and I knew it was time to move out. We are just down the street from her so we can visit anytime.” Chiku said.

While Chiku was enjoying her day off with her daughters, she heard a knock on the door. She opened it and Mae was there with her daughter JJ in her arms. JJ was asleep and Mae didn’t want to let her go.

“Enjoying your day off?” Mae asked.

“Was enjoying it with my daughters until you showed up. What brings you around?” Chiku asked.

“As you might have heard, the café is going to start a softball team. So our manager wants to know if you want in? I told her that you are an amazing player and our schools former captain.”

“If it’s for the café and help prevent it from going down, I guess I can help.”

Mae got her signed up for it and told her that they start practice on Monday. Mae left for she was done with her and Chiku went on with her day with her daughters. They went to the park where Rei was injured. She grabbed her mother’s hand and didn’t want to let go. Asuka grabbed her and said she wouldn’t leave her. She let go of Chiku and went off. Chiku watched carefully in case something happens to Rei again. Rei never left her sister and always runs after her when she leaves her. This made Chiku happy but worry about both of them. Of course, being their mother made her worry all the time but with the condition Rei is in made it worse when they aren’t with her.

Chiku kept working hard at the café and enjoys as much time with her daughters as best she could. Her uniform was a blue, maid like uniform with the skirt that goes down to her knees. When she works nights or is at a game, she has her mother Shinku watch Asuka and Rei. They would be at her games to watch and admire how she got her figure. After the first month, they have won every game. Seeing how happy her daughters are, she thought of having another one. Of course, there is a chance that if Rei gets injured again, she won’t easily be able to take care of her.

“So you want me to help you get pregnant? You’re fortunate I’m a maternity nurse and I’ll see what I can do.” Shinku said.

Chiku waited and looked her daughters over again. She was worried if they were hurt and to ensure their dresses are perfectly fine. She didn’t like it when they are with their grandmother.

“OK Chiku, I got something. It is a synthetic sperm that we made and want you to test it.” Shinku said.

“OK I will.” Chiku said.

Shinku took her granddaughters and waited for her daughter to finish up. When she was, Shinku told her that she has to get back to work and would see what she is having in 4 months. Chiku took her daughters and went to practice. Mae was injured during the last game so she is sitting out for now and offered to watch the twins. JJ loves being with them but she prefers being only with her mother in fear of what might happen. The reason she doesn’t like being away from her mother is that she nearly got kidnapped and lost at the mall once when she was 3. Mae freaked out when it happened and never goes anywhere without her unless she is with her mother. Mae ensures she is fine and makes sure she is next to her.

5 months into her pregnancy, Shinku looked into her daughters belly and said that she is carrying another pair of twin girls. Chiku liked it and her daughters loved that they are going to have little sisters. She loved it and still worked at the café while helping with the team. They all love how she is doing it even though she is pregnant. They love how her pregnant belly looks in her work and softball uniform and how they make her belly look better. Many of the people who visit the café adore her belly. They paid her a little extra for it and ensured to be easy on her. She notices the looks that some of the guys give her and knew they were admiring her belly.

“Man I feel like I should have a little fun.” Chiku said.

Her mother had the weekend off, took Asuka and Rei for the time giving Chiku time to herself, and relaxes. She knew her daughters were in need of some new school supplies so she wanted to get it for them. She knew everything about them including their clothes size, favorite foods, what their colors are and everything else about them. She got them what they needed and dropped them off at home before heading out again. This time she was going to have some ‘fun’ with some boys. Despite being 21, she knew she could get some good boys to do what she wants.

“The mall is a perfect place to do so like last time.” Chiku said.

She got there and looked around for a bit. She was wearing clothes that showed off not only her baby bump but also her other curves as well. She got quite a bit of attention there and loved it. Like how she got pregnant with Asuka and Rei, she charged $15 for every guy and $5 for every girl who wants to do it with her. She got quite a bit of business there and loved it. When she had enough, she moved on to the park. There she had little attention but she did get one boy who was at least in elementary school. He liked her belly and asked to feel it. She rolled up her shirt and let him. Then he asked if he could ‘do her’. She was worried about him until his mother came and told her that he is completely capable of doing so and she let him. They went to a secluded place and went at it. She loved it and she let him ride her as he wanted. When he was finished, they were back there doing it for a good 4 hours. They got back with his mother and she paid her for her ‘services’ to her son. She paid Chiku an astonishing $800 for it. If she keeps working like this along with her job at the café and getting money from the program she’s part of, she would be rich in no time.

Chiku was worried about littl Rei and wondered if she would ever recover. Rei has been in the hospital for 2 months now and Chiku has been visiting her quite often. Every time she visits, Rei looked more and more thinner and paler. The nurces tell her that they are doing all they can but nothing seems to work. One day while visiting, Chiku walked into Rei's room to find it cleaned and Rei missing. Her nurse came in and looked at Chiku in a conserned look.

"Where is Rei at?" Chiku asked.

"She didn't make it Chiku. I'm sorry but she is no longer with us." the nurse said.

Chiku knew what she meant and broke down crying. The nurse comforted the girl and told her that she can see Rei one last time. Chiku looked at her now dead daughter and felt worse. She didn't know how to tell Asuka but had to. She went home and told her mother the news.

"Dont worry Chiku, you still have Asuka and you can still make more." Shinku said.

"I know but I cant stand the idea of breaking Asuka's little heart." Chiku said.

Then Asuka came downstairs running her eyes with one hand and had her favorite teddy bear in the other.

"Where's Rei momma?" Asuka asked groggily.

Chiku told her that her sister is no longer with them. She said that Rei is on the other side piecefully waiting for them. Asuka started to cry and Chiku cradled her tightly. When she finally settled down, Chiku told her that if she wants, she could make more siblings for her. Asuka denied it and said she only wanted Rei.

13111221211221.content:
Chiku and Asuka were pulled out of everything they were in and stayed home. Asuka never went anywhere without her mother and Chiku made sure Asuka was holding her hand where ever she goes. Chiku liked this but wasn’t the same without Rei in her arm or holding her free hand. Chiku let herself go and gained a few pounds. She use to weigh 120 pounds but now weighs 280 pounds. Asuka also put on some weight and is now weight in at 95 pounds. The weight was hard on her young body but she managed to get around still.

“Momma, my heart still hurts.” Asuka said.

“Mine too sweetie.” Chiku said.

Chiku picked her daughter up and held her close to her. Asuka was resting on her mother’s large belly and liked how soft it was. Knowing how hard it is for the two of them to go on like this, Chiku decided to put them out of their misery. She told her mother and told her that if they really cant take it anymore than she will support her ending their lives to be with Rei. They didn’t want to do it any traditional way but wanted to literally go out with a bang. Shinku did her best to cut herself off from them so that when they die, it isn’t hard on her. Chiku decided to use gasoline to do so and Asuka didn’t care. Asuka told her mother that she was happy to be her daughter and hopes to be her daughter on the other side. Chiku told her that she was happy to have been hers and Rei’s mother and will see her and Rei on the other side.

Late one night, Chiku took picked up her sleeping daughter and left. She left a note to her mother saying that they are leaving and she will be weighting on the other side with Asuka and Rei. Chiku hiked all the way to the gas station a couple miles out of town to fall through with her plan. She woke managed to activate one of the pumps by braking into the station and activating it. She filled Asuka up to her limits first and then herself.

“Time to go Asuka. Rei is waiting for us.” Chiku said.

Chiku and Asuka smiled at each other and Chiku struck a match. She made her daughter eat the match and she did. The gas in her ignited and Chiku ate her. She told her that she will be more comfortable when she explodes in there. She got another match but waited to use it.

“Bye bye momma. I’m going to go see Rei now.” Asuka said.

Chiku smiled and told her to go now. Asuka blew up in her mother igniting the gasoline for her. She didn’t know how she survived that blast but knew she wouldn’t survive the next massive one. She bloated up bigger to her true limits and knew it was time for her to go.

“Wait for me my babies.” Chiku said.

She erupted sending everything within 40 yards of her explosion ablaze. When Chiku opened her eyes, she found she was in a warm place with Asuka and Rei in her arms holding her tight.

16-year-old Chiku-Ne was like nearly any other girl her age. She had long black hair that went down to mid back when let down but she keeps it normally up in a ponytail or a bun. She has fair skin and never has to worry about any blemishes of any kind, which made many girls jealous. She stood at 5’11’ and had nice assets. They were big and people love it. Despite that, her biggest asset was her belly. The reason was that she wasn’t pregnant or fat but the fact was that she was a twin and she was in her belly. Despite that, Chiku’s twin has a name and it is Kana. From how Chiku looks, they think Kana looks the same as her twin sister and is the same as her.

“I’m glad to have a big sister like you Chiku.” Kana said.

“It’s actually all because of you, Kana. Without a sweet and loving girl like you in my belly, I wouldn’t really be the girl I am today.” Chiku said.

Chiku can tell that her twin was happy to hear that and went on with class. They went to a private class that their mother went to when she was in school. Shinku loves her daughters no matter what and does all she can to take care of them. When she heard that she was told that she was going to have twins, she was overjoyed but was worried when they were born with Kana inside Chiku. When they were born, Shinku was only 18 and was fortunate to not worry about her education. Her mother owned a successful company and she had inherited a good chunk of it and the company. She actually owns a third of it all for her older two twin sisters owned the other two thirds. Her older sisters take great care of Shinku and loved it when her daughters were born. Just like Shinku, her sisters take great care of Chiku and Kana and treated them to the nicest things for they are so far the only ones that were going to succeed in the family business. Due to all this attention, Chiku and Kana feel like princesses and their mother feels that is accurate. Even though she is her mother and is 18 years older than them, Shinku can easily pull of being their older sister.

“I wonder what mother has made for us. She always makes the best food.” Kana said.

“I know but I’m trying to focus on class. So try to remain still.” Chiku thought.

“Sorry sister, I just can’t for your stomach is rumbling and it’s making me hungry.”

Chiku blushed for she didn’t eat a proper breakfast that morning and forgot to get money for lunch. So she hasn’t fed either of them and knows that Kana gets a little cranky when hungry. Kana wouldn’t stop moving which made it harder for Chiku to focus. One of the other girls noticed Kana was moving and was worried about her. The girl who noticed was their best friend Koko. She was like a little sister to them and knew that Kana was restless in her twin. She knew what causes this and gave Chiku something. That settled Kana for now but not for long. After class, Chiku and Kana went home like usual and was greeted by their mother. She has a couple things set up, ready for them like usual, and Kana can smell it all threw her sisters belly. Chiku started to munch for Kana doesn’t like waiting too long for anything. Shinku sat down next to Chiku and rolled up her belly for she knows Chiku likes it exposed when home and rubbed her belly. With Kana finally settled, Chiku got going on her homework and ready for the weekend.

16 year old Chiku-ne was like many girls her age but wasn’t completely normal like one. The reason was that she was a quadruplet. At first look at her, she looks more like a bit of a fat twin instead of a quadruplet. The reason was that she and her other ‘born’ quadruplet Tai-Li are both carrying their other two quadruplets. Chiku was the oldest and Tai was the second oldest and both are carrying their other two siblings in each of them. They have names but only Chiku and Tai are known and are quite famous. They are so far the only set of quadruplets like this and not only are famous for that but are also being paid with benefits from the government for this. The other two are Kana-Ne in Chiku and Sun-Li in Tai. Despite not being separable from their sisters in them, Chiku and Tai are inseparable. Chiku is a bit out going and quite caring for her other sisters, as Tai was a bit more reserved and quite.

“Alright in there, Kana?” Chiku asked.

“I’m fine sister.” Kana replied.

“How about you, Sun?”

“I’m fine as well. But I just wish Tai would eat something more healthy and be more active.” Sun said.

Tai blushed and felt bad for her habits. Chiku told her that she is just doing what she can as her sister. Chiku was glad to have someone like Tai to share this experience with and as her sister. Shinku was worried when they were younger about their condition but now that they are 16 and healthy, she was glad to have a set of quadruplets like them. When they were born, the doctors were worried about them. They said that they would live to be at least one or two years old. If they lasted that long, the two that were in Chiku and Tai were expected to live to at least 5 years old before dying. Now that they just turned 16 and both Chiku and Tai got their drivers licenses and love it. Shinku loves it and how both of her ‘born’ daughters can drive themselves. She got them both the cars they want which happened to be the same kind of convertible. They had their driver seats set a bit far back due to how big their bellies are. To save on gas, they take the same car. Chiku normally drives but Tai would buy her gas. Money wasn’t a problem for the company that Shinku worked for was her own company and they are making a ton of money. Sun and Kana tried to remain as still a possible while they drive so they don’t cause a wreck. The school they went to was a private girl’s school and they had special uniforms unlike the other girls. The standard uniform consisted of the shirt, jacket, skirt, and shoes. Theirs had a light change and that was that unlike having a skirt, it was replaced with short-legged overalls for support. They were the most popular girls in school due to being quadruplets and the fact that both are carrying one of the other two of their set.

Things seemed relative normal for Chiku-Ne if one can get past her extended midsection. The cause for it's size wasn't from her getting fat or pregnant but her parasitic sibling. Chiku was out side in her back yard in the hot summer. She wants to cool off but she had no pool to swim in. Then she had an idea. She would inflate her self. Chiku walked over to the hose and put the hose into her mouth and opened the valve. She felt the cold water flow into her mouth, down her throat, and into her belly. She put her hands onto her belly and felt the skin on her belly becoming cooler.

“This feels so good.” Chiku thought to herself.

Then she felt her belly starting to expand. She looked down and started to rub her belly. She covered her belly with her shirt and closed the valve. Chiku took the hose out of her mouth and went inside. She was home alone for a while and went to her room. Every step Chiku took, she felt the water swooshing around in her belly. Along with that, her belly expanded bigger. When she got to her room, Chiku’s belly was the size of a large watermelon. Chiku got out of her current clothes and got her old expansion suit she got when she was a blueberry girl. She put on her large pink bra and panties. Then she got on her expansion singlet and then got out her largest elastic shirt and overalls.

“At least now my clothes won’t pop me.” Chiku said.

Chiku went to the mall to get some bigger clothes. While she was there, she ran into one of her friends, Sin-Ku. They looked at her and then at her belly.

“Chiku, are you pregnant?” Sin-Ku asked.

“No I’m not pregnant. But I wish I was.” Chiku said. “I just inflated my belly with water to make it bigger. I plan on inflating my whole body with water. What are you here for?”

“Well, I just adopted a 5 year old Chinese girl so I’m getting some clothes for her. And I am pregnant with twin girls so I’m getting maternity clothes and clothes for them.”

“When are you due?” Chiku asked.

“In about 6 months.” Sin-Ku said.

“How far into your pregnancy are you?”

“Only 1 week.”

“Isn’t a normal pregnancy last 9 months?”

“Well, my family has genetics that shortens the woman’s pregnancy by 3 months by speeding it up a bit.”

“Well that is a bit stranger than what happens in my family.”

“What is it?”

“Well, the females are pregnant for 2 years and look like they are only 9 months pregnant at the end.”

They the left and went home. Chiku saw her mother was home and went in. Shinku saw Chiku’s new belly and stopped her.

“What happened to you Chiku?” Shinku asked. “Are you pregnant?”

“No I’m not pregnant. I just inflated my belly this big with water.” Chiku said.

“Like you did when you were younger.”

“Yes, but this time I’m plan on getting bigger with water instead of air.”

“Ok, I hope you could hold it in longer than the ones I’ve seen in the videos.”

“Don’t worry. If I’m able to hold this much water in my belly for the last 2 hours, then I could hold more water for days.”

Chiku went out back and put the hose back into her mouth. She opened the valve and felt the water flow into her belly. Then Chiku felt her belly starting to grow again. She put her hands onto her belly and moaned.

She got home and was greeted by her mother who was glad she was back to school and enjoying herself.

Chiku got going on the second bowl and got it down in roguhly the same amount of time. The third bowl came out and she got it done at the 55 minute mark. These three bowls were definitely over that and would possibly throw out all the work to what she is now. Chiku continued to enjoy her life and growing her hair for a job. She loved it even more with Tien back in her life for the first time as her twin sister since they were born. Tao loves it for she told Shinku that Tien was that a bit hard to make happy and seemed a bit depressed at times. Now that the twins are together, they couldn't be happier. Tao still acts as mother to Tien and as a second mother to Chiku. Shinku was happy to have both of her daughters together and was a bit overprotective to Tien. Chiku still hangs around with Chiharu who was a little suprized that there was a second Chiku. To be clear, Tien is actually the older twin and Chiku was the younger twin. That didn't bother them for Chiku acts as the older twin and Tien as the younger one. Tien was always happy with her sister and dosen't want to leave her any time soon.

"Tien, you look a little worried about something." Chiku said.

"You know about twin psychic abilities right? I think I can sense something about to happen to you." Tien said.

Chiku didn't believe her and went to get her hair cut. She got her usual cut and pay. It wasn't much but Tien decided to donate her hair. She had 2 feet of hair to do so and got her hair cut to the same as her sisters. She was paid $450 for it and got signed up to do this with her sister. She was also given a shot like the one Chiku was given. Shinku liked how both of her daughters have a job that pays quite well for their hair. While at home after geting their hair cut, Chiku felt what Tien was talking about earlier. It was coming from her stomach and wondered whats going on. Tien looked at her twin and smiled for she knows Chiku figured out what she was talking about earlier. They haven't eaten yet but for some reason she was full. Her belly began to expand out and kept growing until she looked to be as big as Octomoms belly. She rubbed her belly and wondered what just happened. Tien teased her for being fat and Chiku didn't like it. To prove she isn't fat they went to weigh themselves. They have the same size and build as each other so they should have the same weight. Tien weighed in at 120 pounds and so should Chiku. When she stepped on it, she weighed at 170 pounds. Whatever it is, there's 50 pounds of it. The next morning, she was checked out and said she had a 50 pound ball of hair in her.
13133212111121.title: Chiku has a strange growth

choices: Tien and her mothers meet the same end
131332121111212.content:
Chiku did her best to continue on with her life despite having a hairball growing in her. Her hair outside her body was growing normally and sells it every 2 weeks with Tien. They were making money fast and were on the cover of newspapers and such for how much they donated and being quite popular. Despite the disgusting fact that she has a hair ball in her belly and has to carry it around everyday due to the fact there was no safe way to properly take it out, people actually like it.

"How does it feel?" Tien asked.

"Its a challenge and hurts a bit. As you know I have a hard time eating from it." Chiku said.

Chiku tries to eat as normal as possible but cant easily due to the hair in her. With every passing day, it gets bigger and bigger without any signs of stopping until its out of her or kills her. After 2 months of this, the ball of hair in her was up to now 150 pounds. Her overall weight is now 270 pounds and she didn't know how much bigger she can get like this. For some reason, she cant take the taste of normal food but wants hair for some reason. The place that cuts and sells her hair took her in to watch her.

"We'll visit as often as possible." Tien siad.

Tien kissed her sister on the lips and went out. The facility took great care of Chiku and ensured that she was fine. They kept reports and such on her progress. The disgarded and unwanted or just all out unusable hair was fed to Chiku. They thought that her hair in her belly was more valuable than whats on her head and thought it might get more. They valued it per pound instead of per foot like usual at $500 per pound. At 150 pounds, she is estimated to have a belly full of $75,000 if extracted now. Then again, it could cost her life if done so. Then again, her family, especially her twin, can use it. With every passing week, she was noticing large growths. She also got a crazy idea. If her belly was going to keep getting bigger. then why not make her hair on her head as long as possible. Each week was 50 pounds more of hair plus a rapid growth of 5 feet of hair to add. They theorize that due to the hair in her belly plus all the hair she eats is a cause of that. After 10 months, Chiku had the largest belly of hair and the longest hair ever. They had found a way a while back to remove the hair in her belly but she was beyond that point. 8 months ago her hair growth went from 5 feet a week to 10 feet a week. At the same time, her hair ball went from 50 pounds a week to 100. Her hair is 360 feet long and her hair ball was at 3600 pounds. The hair in her belly was valued at $1.8 million while her hair length was $72,000. That was quite a bit of money but it was over for her.

"Be a good girl and grow lots of hair for me, my twin." Chiku said.

This was over for Chiku for there was no way to save her.

"Get her more hair to eat. As much as you can." Tien said.

They got her the hair and Chiku ate it. They also got her some hair products to make the hair go down easier as well as make the hair in her richer in value and condition. When she couldn't eat anymore, she ate a little more before stopping. Her hair got longer and felt her hair ball getting bigger. When her hair stopped growing, It was measured to be 3 miles long and the hair in her belly was weighed at 30 tons. At that size and length, her hair ball was valued at $30 million and her hair length was at $3.2 mllion. Since this was it, Chiku requested that all the money be sent to Tien. Tien claimed it and kissed her sister goodbye for the last time. When they thought her hair couldn't get any bigger or longer, her length doubled and her belly kept get growing until it popped at 45 tons. Tien was given a grand total of her sisters end at $52 million. She and her family was rich but that wont ever bring back her twin sister.
131332121111212.title: It gets too big for Chiku

1313321211112122.content:
Tien liked the money she got for her sister's hair but didn't like the cost of her life in the end to get it. To make it up, she and Chiharu increased their hair growth fo her. Unfortunatly it didn't end well for Chiharu. One day on her way to her part time job, someone hooked it to a piece of machinery and it pulled her in. She tried to escape and even tried to cut her own hair but wasn't quick enough. The machine was stopped but not in a good position for her. Her mouth was pressed against one of its air hoses that broke off and got lodged in her mouth. She flailed around to get loose but by the time she was close to getting free, the loss of air pressure started the machine again. The pressue from the air in her combined with the machine pressing against her emded up causing her to explode in it. Due to them, all the girls in their school and around town were growing their hair out. To keep her hair long for her sister and friend, the shortest Tien would go is to her shoulders.

"Mom, I'm home." Tien said.

"There you are Tien. We have a bit of a surprise for you." Shinku said.

Shinku and Tao came into the living room and Tien dropped her bag. Both her birth mother and adoptive mother had their hair grown out down to the ground and their bellies were as big as basketballs. She poked their bellies and they said that they were full of hair like Chiku's. Tien smiled and asked how. They injected her with a shot that they were given. Though they were given one each, they gave Tien 2. She didn't care but then realized something. With 2 shots of the amount they gave her, she would rapidly grow hair inside her. They went to the facility to get checked in and live out the rest of their hair growing lives there but ran into a problem. On the way, Tien's belly swelled up to te size of a beach ball but that wasn't the problem. The problem was Tao and how big she was getting. Her belly was soon touching the dashboard in front of her and still stretching bigger from the growing hair.

"Live happy you two." Tao siad.

She was too big to get out and her belly burst in there. The car was distroyed which they didnt care. The amount of money she was valued at was added to their account. They combined their accounts into one and said that once they're gone, to give it to the government for hair relate work. In the center of the courtyard in the middle of the facility was a statue of Chiku with long hair and a round belly. She was hailed as a goddess there for what happened to her. Unlike how Chiku's hair grew 5 to 10 feet longer every week and 50 to 100 pounds heavier, their hair was getting 15 feet longer and 150 pounds heavier. Shinku was next and popped at 2,400 feet long and 5 tons. When that happened, Tien's growth increased to 30 feet and 300 pounds a day. She quickly got up to her sisters size and length in no time which she liked.

"We looked alike, we thought alike, we worked and grew alike, now we must die alike. But since I'm the big twin, I must die bigger." Tien said.

She broke Chiku's record and held out as long as possible. In the end, Tien lasted 10 months like her sister. Her hair grew out to an outragous 20 miles long and weighed in at 650 tons. They kept her going for 2 more months which was bad. She should've died at the end of the 10th month but cant die now for some reason. It was hard and painfull on her but they forced her to get bigger and told her that it was all in the name of research and fashion. She was forced to do this for 2 years before her heart gave out. At that point, her hair was 47 miles long and weighed 1,650 tons. At the time of her death, it was all valued at $1,7 billion. It all ended when her hair was 60 miles long and her body popped at 3,500 tons and a value of $3.6 billion.

1321322.content:
Chiku-Ne seemed to be like any other girl her age but there was something different about her. Taking a closer look reveals that difference. Instead of being at a healthy weight, she was incredibly thin. She was practically homeless and took whatever job and food she could. They didn't last long but she did what she could with it.

"After you sure you don't need our help?" A classmate asked.

"I'm fine. You don't need to about me all weekend." Chiku said.

"You're coming home with me no matter what. You need to fatten up and make some money." Her other classmate said.

She took Chiku who actually liked it. She brought her plate after plate of food until she felt like she was going to burst. Chiku couldn't remember the last time she had a proper home made meal. She knew she was from a nice home but didn't know she was from a wealthy family. Next step is to fatten her up and then possibly a job. She then thought of one. Their family has this new cattle business that could work.

"You want me to clean up after cows and such?" Chiku asked.

"Not clean up after then and such. You are the cow. Easy pay and easy work. Just take it easy and fatten up. The bigger your waistline is, the more you'll be paid." She said.

The next day, they went to the location to get her signed up. They ran into her mother while there. She looked at Chiku and smiled. She knew that she could become a prized girl. They got her applied and into her uniform. It was a diving suit like attire with short sleeves and legs. It was fairly loose on her due to her current weight. She definitely will grow into it. She was given strap on sandals that she looked. The attire she was wearing had the black and white cow pattern on it that she didn't mind having. Chiku was taken to her stall which will be her new home. There waiting for her was some food and a woman in her early 30s named Shinku. She would be taking care of her and would help her when needed.
1321322.title: Weight farm

13213221.content:
Chiku continued on being a cow for one of her classmates and enjoyed it each day. It's been a couple weeks now and she has been paid each week. It was a pase pay of $300 plus her current weight. When she got the job, she weighed in at 70 pounds. So she was paid an additional $70 as her weight pay. She gets food each day and eats it all no matter what it was. It wasn't because she was homeless and hungry or for it was her job and to fatten up but because she never had the chance for some time to eat like this and barely enjoyed it before when it came. The school allows her to dress like this at school for they had a couple other students in it and a couple teachers as well. She likes it but fears how people would think about her when she fattens up. One of the girls in her class was one as well and she became quite close with her and the others.

"What are you planning to do today?" her friend said.

"I plan on entering this competition." Chiku said.

"That sounds a bit like you."

"You should join as well Ayano."

Ayano denied and let her have the fun. They went to the location and Chiku got in. It started shortly after and Chiku ate away. Regardless if she won or lost, this was some really good food. There was nothing Chiku would do to get something to eat and possibly get paid. They had an hour to eat as much as they could and the person that at the most wins. Ayano watched as her friend stuffed herself with whatever she can for she knows her past. Chiku remained in a blissful state while she ate oblivious to the time she had remaining. In the end...
13213221.title: Chiku enters a competition

132132211.content:
...Chiku won. She liked it and collected her winnings. It was at $15,000 for the win and for breaking the record previously at 79 bowls, she was given an additional $10 per bowl past that. She managed to stuff herself with a total and near gut busting 102 bowls. She was given an additional $230 for the difference. Ayano liked it and can tell that by the way she was eating anything and everything given to her would fatten her up nicely. They made their way to the factory for Chiku to settle in for the night.

"Night Chiku. I'll see you tomorrow." Ayano said.

"See ya, Ayano." Chiku said.

Ayano left for the night and Chiku got settled in. She thought of how life had changed for the better for her. That is if being a cow is better. At least compared to living on the streets taking whatever job she could and barely eating a thing. Shinku was a great friend to have around and help to her. If her classmate didn't offer her a job here and got it, then she wouldn't be as happy as she is. She guessed she had gained a few pounds at least in the last couple weeks and she was more than happy as is. Seeing how big some of the other women there are got her thinking. She knows that she might be a prized cow and such in time but what's on her mind is her size. She smiled at the thought of being fat and happy instead of thin and miserable. There was one concern, one of the largest women went missing the other day and no one will tell her why. She would find out soon enough, if it happens to her.
132132211.title: Chiku won

1321322111.content:
After a peaceful sleep and a plesent dream with a full belly, Chiku got up with a stretch and content yawn. At her little table in her stall was Ayano waiting for her. She looked at Chiku and smiled. Today they were going to have their monthly check up and weigh in. Ayano gave her something to eat before heading out. They made their way to the area to be checked out and were greeted by the owners daughter and their classmate Reiko. She took her classmates to another room to be examined. She knows how to do this kind of stuff and would be doing it for them.

"Are you sure you are qualified, Reiko?" Ayano asked.

"Of course. It's only right I get some work experience before heading off to college to possibly take over the companty." Reiko said.

She got them going and they liked it. Her touch was quite gentle and loving which put them at ease. Everything went smoothly and she found nothing wrong with them. The last bit was to weigh them. Ayano got onto the scale and Reiko looked at the screen. It read 320 pounds which was great. Chiku was next and she was worried about her weight. To mess with her a bit, Reiko grabbed the back of her attire and pulled it back so it tightened around her front. It revealed her newly growing pot belly. The screen showed her weight shortly after and it read 95 pounds. That was perfect for Chiku and gave her a bit of a pay raise on her weight pay. This would be more concidered around the lighter end of a healthy weight for a girl her age but more than so if one was as thin as can be and homeless. Ayano and Chiku left and went to have some fun. Chiku knew that Ayano was big by the looks of her but thought she would be a bit heavier. But that can easily be put down to her being short. Ayano doesn't mind being called fat but wat sets her off is being called short.

After witnessing rapid fattening and eventual explosion, Shinku knew there was no way to properly, safely or possibly legal way to sell her meat after such an event. So she gathered it all up and decided to eat it all. She began eating and loved how it tasted, despite it being another human and raw. She guessed Chiku had to be at least 1,000 pounds when she blew up and roughly half that was able to be salvaged by her. Each and every chunk was delisious and as sweet as she was alive.

"I wish you were properly 'disposed' of and even prized right." Shinku said.

She kept eating and watched her belly push out bigger and bigger with every bite. Part way through it, Shinku stopped and rubbed her belly. She was stuffed but wanted more but cant. She felt like she was going to burst if she ate another bite. So she rubbed her belly and liked how part of her friend was in her, even if that one was a cow. Bit by bit, Shinku ate away at her friend's remains and enjoyed it.

"Soon the two of us would be together and I would fulfill your job." Shinku said.

A couple hours passed and she finished the last of Chiku. There was nothing left of her but the remains of her clothes and the few strands of hair. She collected it all up and made her way home. It was a struggle from the amount of fat and such her now dead friend that was packed within her. She plopped down on her couch and rubbed her belly in hopes to sooth her pain.

It was an average day for Chiku-Ne as accompanied her mother to her. Shinku-Li liked it when her daughter cane to work with her. This time is different than the other times. Chiku adored her little Yuki and how well she turned out. Shinku tried to take her granddaughter from Chiku but Chiku went into defensive mode and didn't let her. She knew it was her own mother but she understood what it's like to be her. After a while, she managed to loosen Chiku to let her take Yuki. Chiku was checked out again and nothing was found. It was quite strange indeed. They thought it could be from her being a new mother and having a slight side effect from having such a rush pregnancy using only her DNA. Then again, there could be something going on that they're not finding.
13223221221113.title: Chiku feels strange

132232212211131.content:
Chiku kept a good grip on Yuki when she got her back for something was definitely up. Shinku liked it but was worried about her daughter. Such a young girl shouldn't worry so much. Then again, she does have a child of her own now to take care of. So they kept a watchful eye on Chiku incase something happens. Shinku left for a bit to get some other work done fully knowing Chiku could take care of herself and Yuki as well as being watched by the others.

The feeling came up stronger this time and she felt it focus down in her belly. She lifted Yuki higher up her body to ensure whatever's happening to her doesn't harm her. She looked in a mirror and saw her belly beginning to grow again. She kept both hands on Yuki for she didn't want to drop her and was in a bit of fear. She was sent to China for her mission and was in fortunate to go there. She happens to be part Chinese and is able to speak, read and write Chinese fluently. Normally Chiku gets stuck with a couple guys that hit on her but not this time, she was teamed up with 3 girls who adores Chiku's beauty.

"Yeah, tells us." another said.

"OK, Chiku, you are watching our backs with your riffle while me, Jennifer and Emma go out and secure the area. How good is your Chinese Chiku?"

"Liúlì de běndì rén yīyàng." (Fluent like a native)

"What?"

"I said, fluent like a native."

They got to know each other and their group leader is Moka. She told Chiku that if they go to Japan or Korea, she will be their translated. Chiku told her that she also knows Korean and Japanese as well.

"Wow Chiku, you must be a super genius. Why are you in the military?" Moka asked.

"It's just something i wanted to do." Chiku said.

"Or was it that your mother was a legendary sniper?" Jennifer asked.

They went on with their mission and found a place to stay. One of the things they need is to get a job while there so they can support themselves and pay for their apartment. They were fortunate to get an affordable, four bedroom apartment in the nice part of town. Thy all went looking but found noting at first. After a couple days, Moka got a job as a store clerk, Jennifer was a waitress at a dinner along with Emma but Chiku don't have any luck. Since the other three got well paying jobs, they told her they could take care of the bills for now. So Chiku stayed at the apartment most if the time and keeps it clean. She has a bit of a habit to keep everything clean and organized at home which will be nice to do here for her team mates when they come home after work.

Chiku got to know her and she gave Chiku her American name which was Emma. Chiku liked Emma and they got going. Chiku was injected with some sperm and went on her way. A month after taking to contract, Chiku has her first exam. She was told by Emma that she is definitely pregnant and is carrying a full belly of 6 babies. She was amazed that she is carrying that many and hoped they turn out to be what they hope. She was told that they used sperm from strong and reliable men to impregnate her.

“I’m glad you can produce so many at once Chiku. Without women like you, there won’t be so many babies around.” Emma said.

“I know but I feel off for some reason.” Chiku said.

“That must be just your pregnancy.”

“Remember, I have been pregnant twice before so I know what the symptoms are. This is definitely not one of them.”

Emma looked at the sniper and saw the worried look on her face. Chiku had already rolled her shirt back down over her belly and was rubbing it. Then a small bump started to grow on her belly. It kept growing bigger and bigger by the second. Chiku’s maternity instincts kicked in again and told Emma that she is going through a rapid pregnancy. Her belly soon reached 6 months and was quite large. Her pants button popped off as it continued to grow. When she reached full term, Chiku couldn’t believe how big she is. She rubbed her swollen baby bump and knew that she would give birth.

She changed her attire a bit so that she is wearing proper maternity clothes. She wears dresses on occasion but wears large, loose fitting shirts and overalls to help support her belly. Chiku tried to continue on like normal but found it hard to do so. Her mother wants her out more but due to the weight of her belly made it somewhat hard.

“But did you have to pop out 6 more before them and double that amount in less than a month. To top that, you didn’t have to be a sniper as well in a foreign land.” Chiku said.

Chiku smiled and gave her mother a hug. Shinku put her hand onto her daughters belly and felt all 6 moving. Chiku guessed they were hungry. Since she was this big already, she might as well gain the weight she lost from China and a little fatter. Her mother got her some food and made sure all 7 of them had more than enough to eat. Chiku felt like they were all going to explode. She plopped back down on the couch and rubbed her soldier filled belly.

After Chiku gave birth to all 6 babies, she was told her time was done with the contract. She thought that she would be doing it for a couple more pregnancies but they told her that due to what happened with this one, they are discontinuing the program due to this and other reasons that they didn’t disclose to her. She looked in with Emma and she told her that she is one of the lucky ones. The reason they discontinued it is for all the ones that were in it ended up either being overpopulated, health rapidly declined, their babies rapidly aged and blew out of their bellies or other horrific ends.

“I’m glad I only had 6. I’m going to regret saying this but I hope they dispose of those 6 soon before it gets too late to do so.” Chiku said.

“I hope so too. You know, the reason you the way you are is because you’re only related to me and no father. You’re a pure bred worrier build for these kinds of things. You are one of only about 4 that were part of the same program 21 years ago that are still alive.” Shinku said.

“Are they female or not?”

“All of you are female. So you can say you have 3 ‘sisters’ in this program still alive.”

Chiku smiled and hoped the other 3 are doing just fine as well. Now that she isn’t needed for military breeding purposes or needed in general, Chiku settled down for the time being. Thinking of what her mother said the other day; Chiku decided that she would be her own mother and have a child of her own. Shinku thought that would be a great idea for when her military career ends.

“You’re not up for another health exam for another couple months. Is something wrong now that your last batch has to be killed?” Emma asked.

“Is not that but I want to see if you have anything that would help me get pregnant without this crazy military works.” Chiku said.

“Be at my apartment later tonight and I might help.”

Chiku told her mother that she is meeting her friend that night. She arrived at Emma’s apartment like planned and Emma was already at work. Emma knew of her medical concoctions from China would help. Chiku took it when she finished it. Emma told her that in the next 3 weeks, she would go through the same symptoms that a woman would go threw in the first 3 months.

“So I would go through a pregnancy in 2 months instead of the full 9?” Chiku asked.

“That’s right. Now, go home and rest up and possibly get a shower in. you stink a bit.” Emma said.

Chiku went home and took a nice cool bath. Despite being a program experiment, Chiku was happy to be alive and bring in so many children into world and hoped to bring another one as her own.

“There’s no way you’re taking my child. If I’m bringing it into the world, then I’m raising it.”

Oh and by the way, I got kicked out of my apartment and Aunt Shinku said I can stay in the basement room for the time being for a small fee. So I guess I’m your sister now instead of your cousin.”

Chiku helped her cousin unpack and get settled in. they got caught up over the last couple years since Chiku has been gone and Sun-Sun was amazed at what had happened to her. “Ok Chiku, I was given your new contract.” Emma said.

“OK, let me look threw it.” Chiku said.

Chiku read threw it and saw she was going to be used as a baby factory. She signed it and went to work. She was taken to a warehouse one base. Emma injected a gel into Chiku’s womb and took Kana. “2 died in labor, one died of natural causes. 4 died from producing more than their bodies could handle and blew up. The last 5 died from getting blocked up and over produced to the point they blew up. So we hope that you are the one and produce the 4,000 we need.”

14521221.content:
Chiku sighed as she submitted her third job application this morning. “Please, please let this be the one,” she muttered, moving a strand of her tangled black hair over her shoulder. Normally a cheerful and optimistic person, the twenty-four-year-old college business graduate had a gloomy outlook on her job hunting; searching and filling out applications without getting any interview for the past month normally has that effect on anyone.

It didn’t help her mood that she felt uncomfortably bloated even since waking up. Every now and then the pressure would subside before it resurfaces, causing Chiku to grip her stomach. “What’s wrong with me today? Maybe a break will help. I’m probably just stressing myself out.”

Closing her laptop, Chiku walked out of her room and into the apartment living room. “Hey Ami, you want anything for breakfast?” she called out to her roommate to no reply. Perplexed, she walked to her roommate’s door and noticed the room was devoid of said roommate. “Huh, she usually tells me when she’s leaving. Must have been in a hurry.”

Suddenly, Chiku bent over in pain as the bloating sensation return. “Ohhh, this is worse than before. Forget about making breakfast, I need to lie down,” she groaned, gingerly shuffling her way to the living room before lying on the couch. She tried distracting herself by watching TV, but the mounting pressure inside her stomach was too severe to ignore. “I don’t understand,” Chiku said while rubbing her troubled stomach. “I felt bloated before, but it never lasted this long or felt this intense. Did I do something strange last night or— Ahh!”

The young woman clutched her belly as she was hit the strongest bloating pang she felt all morning. She curled up on the couch, squirming and moaning from the rapid pressure buildup within herself. With clenched eyes and gritted teeth, Chiku grunted and tightly grasped her belly as the pressure reached its boiling point.

*BWWOOOMP!*

Chiku slowly her eyes, the pressure in her belly seemingly subsided. Getting herself into a sitting position, she breathed a sigh of relief, thankful she passed through that experience. Then she looked down and spotted a prominent change before screaming in utter shock. Resting on her lap was her belly protruding from her midsection. Her purple pajama shirt stretched over the top half of her distended belly. Lifting her stomach, Chiku dropped it on her lap and gasped as it bounced and wobbled from the impact.

“W-What… I-I-I… H-H-How?” she stuttered. “This… This can’t be real.” Chiku tried pressing her hands on her stomach, her futile attempts were met with the bloated dome springing back into place every time. “It's real, and I’m struck like this. I can’t go outside, let alone get a job, with my belly the size of a... a soccer ball! Oh, what am I going to do?"
14521221.title: A Severe Case of Morning Bloating

choices: "We're going to the mall to get you bigger clothes."
145212211.content:
Chiku’s ears perked up when she heard the apartment’s door opening.

“Hey, Chiku, you awake? I brought breakfast,” Walking into the apartment with a bag of takeout food in hand was Chiku’s roommate Ami. Standing taller than Chiku, she set the food on the nearby table as she moved part of her shoulder length brunette hair from her face. Having meet during their college freshmen year, the duo immediately became fast friends. So naturally, when Chiku find out Ami was looking for a roommate weeks before graduation, she happily volunteered.

“Ami, wait! Don’t come in!” Chiku yelled as she jumped to her feet.

“Why? What’s wrong?” Ami asked as she removed her sunglasses, her emerald eyes widen when she focused on Chiku’s distended bobbing belly. “What happened to your stomach?!”

“I don’t know. I woke up with these bloating aches and they got worse and worse until my belly just bursts outward.”

“Chiku, you’re beyond bloated. You’re reaching pregnant territory.”

Staring at her belly, Chiku blushed and pulled down her pajamas shirt over her rotund middle. “H-Hey! That’s not helping.”

“Sorry, sorry. Maybe we’re overreacting. Let’s give your stomach some time to shrink before we do anything.”

“I… I guess we tried that. We’ll wait a few hours and… Oh no,” Chiku murmured as she grasped her belly. With worried eyes, she watched her belly swelled again. “It’s happening again. Ami, help me think of something.”

“Like what?” the brunette retorted. “I don’t know what to do when someone starts blowing up. I’m just as confused as you are. at least it’s only your stom—Chinku, your hips!”

Looking downwards, Chiku’s eyes widened as her hips flared out. Thankfully, her pajamas bottoms stretched accordingly to meet her hips’ growing needs; at least she didn’t have to worry about those bottoms ripping anytime soon.

But as quickly as the inflation started, it ended just as fast. The two dumbfounded roommates examined Chiku’s new figure. Her big rounded belly was on full display as her pajamas shirt rested on top while she adjusted her stance to compensate her swollen hips. “Ohhh, this is horrible! I looked like a bloated freak! Can I even walk like this?”

“Ami, it’s okay. We’ll get through this,” Ami said.

“Okay? Okay?! Ami, look at me! How is this okay?!” Chiku slapped her bulging stomach to emphasize her point; it bounced around like crazy while emitting a low pitch thump sound.

“I know. I can see you perfectly clear…. A lot of you but getting angry won’t help. We don’t why you’re inflating but that doesn’t mean there isn’t a cure available. And don’t think you’re facing this alone; I’ll be at your side the entire time.”

Chiku couldn’t help but smile at Ami’s encouragement. She waddled awkwardly, largely due to her enlarged figure, and hugged her roommate. Or she tried to but her huge belly prevented her from even reaching Ami, so she turned sideways and then gave Ami a hug. “Thanks, Ami, you always know what to say.”

“Hey, we looked after each other. Besides, what are friends for?” Ami said as she returned the embrace. They continue holding their embrace for several moments until the silence was broken by a rumbling noise. After breaking the hug and noticing the blush on Chiku’s face, Ami giggled and rubbed her friend’s belly. “Aww, is the big fellow hungry? Well, lucky for you two, I’ve brought breakfast. Come on, after we eat, we’ll figure out what to do next.”

Once they finished eating, Ami searched through her closet while Chiku sat patiently on her bed. “Where is it? I know it’s here. Aha! Found it! Here, put these on.” Ami gave the big-bellied Chiku a pair of elastic yoga pants and a hooded sweatshirt.

“Okay,” Chiku said as she waddled into Ami’s bathroom. “You know, you still haven’t told me what we’re doing.”

“Honestly, it been overwhelming. This morning I only worry about finding a job. But now, I must worry about making it through a doorway, or make sure my clothes don’t rip or burst off or hoped that I can still move around as I get bigger and bigger,” Chiku sighed as she slumped into the couch.

“Yeah right. I’m practically a human balloon. I don’t see how something like this will get better.” Chiku grabbed and shook her big belly. Turing to her roommate, she noticed Ami was looking back and forth between herself and her belly while sporting a mischievous grin. Chiku’s eyes widened in fear. “Ami, no! You’re not doing this again! Stay away!”

“Too late.” Ami quickly seated herself on top of Chiku’s belly, pinning her bloated roommate. “Hey, your belly is pretty comfy, and it also makes it easier to do this!” She proceeded to tickle Chiku’s belly.

Almost immediately, Chiku began squirming around as she held her breath. She clenched her hands and kicked her legs as she felt the giggles surfacing.

“Chiku, you should know better than to fight it. Just let it happen,” Ami said with a cheeky grin.

“Mmrrph!” Chiku muffled in defiance though she started to giggle in short bursts.

“You never learn, do you?” Ami chuckled as she lowers her hands and tickled her roommate’s underbelly.

“AHAHAHA!! Amihehehehe, stop! It tick—HAHAHAHAHA!!” Chiku burst into laughter.

“That’s the idea, now stop squirming. Aren’t you enjoying this?”

“NO! Hehehehe, g-g-get off!” Chiku pushed her friend to the other side of the sofa. “You know I don’t like your surprise tickles and you especially know how ticklish I am. They’re only enjoyable for—Hey, what’re you doing?”

“I wasn’t finished tickling you,” Ami stated, pulling in her roommate. “And since you can’t hold still, I’ll make you hold still.” She wrapped her legs around Chiku’s waist and pulled up the purple shirt, revealing the top half of Chiku’s belly.

“A-Ami, please, you don’t—”

“Yes, I do. Oh, the more you struggle, the longer I tickle you. Your choice, now do me a favor and lower your waistband.”

Realizing her trapped fate, Chiku sighed and followed the instruction. She gave a pleading glance at the smiling brunette before erupting into laughter again as Ami resumed tickling. To prevent herself from stopping the tickling, Chiku placed her hands over her mouth. Of course, that didn’t stop her from wildly kicking her legs. Ami, on the other hand, happily watched her friend squirmed and laughed as she tickled away. Whether or not Chiku heeded her warning didn’t matter to the brunette; she just enjoys having fun, even at her roommate’s expanse.

After two minutes of agonizing tickling, Ami finally relented, giving Chiku a moment to calm down. “Sooo… do you feel better?” Ami asked.

“I feel lightheaded but yes, I do feel better. Thanks,” Chiku replied.

“Anytime,” Ami said, tapping on Chiku’s belly. “Hey, you don’t mind if I drum on your stomach, do you?”

“What? I thought we were done.”

“We are, just think of it as my reward for helping your mood.”

Chiku turned around and raised an eyebrow at her roommate before she sighed. “Okay, but you’re unreal sometimes.”

Grinning ear to ear, Ami wasted no time in starting her drum session. The swollen abdomen wobbled nonstop as it emitted drumesque sounds. Although Chiku tried distracting herself with her phone, she couldn’t stop the smile forming on her face. She couldn’t ask for a better friend to make the most of her uncertain future. That and she kinda enjoy having her belly wobble around in her lap.

~~~


The journey to Ami’s parents’ house was eventful, to say the least. From pushing Chiku out the apartment’s door, carrying her down the stairs, and somehow pushing the spherical girl into Ami’s car— all while encountering the surprised stares of bystanders—the duo was thoroughly exhausted and embarrassed. They drove in silence, neither person wanted to bring mention to Chiku’s impending fate slowly becoming reality.

Soon they arrived at their destination. Ami’s mother, Misaki Matsumoto, stood on the porch, awaiting their arrival. She made her way down the front steps, her long flowing brunette hair swayed behind her as her potbelly bounced from under her shirt.

“Hey, Mom, thanks for helping out. Where’s Dad?” Ami asked.

“He was called for a mandatory work meeting. It might take a while,” Misaki answered. “So how is Chiku? I haven’t seen her since the two of you graduated.”

“She… Actually, I think it’s easier to show you than to tell you,” Ami said, guiding her mother to her car.

After the shock of seeing Chiku’s appearance passed Misaki, she and Ami carried the ball-shaped woman into the house. As they settled in the living room, Misaki learned everything that happened the past day. “Oh Chiku, I’m so sorry,” she comforted.

“It’s okay, Mrs. Matsumoto. It’s not your fault,” Chiku said.

“No, but I can empathize with your condition. Years ago, I was diagnosed with a severe bloating problem. It caused me to expand to outlandish sizes, sometimes even bigger than your current size. There were times when was I afraid to leave the house. I… I couldn’t deal with being a freak.”

Misaki tightly balled up her fists, her body slightly trembling. Ami moved to her mother’s side and hugged as Misaki sobbed on her shoulder. Several moments passed before Misaki wiped her tears and resumed speaking.

“Luckily, I had supporters besides me, especially from my husband and daughter. I picked myself up, made some adjustments, and over time, I learned to accept it. Chiku, I know my problem isn’t the same, but I know you want to know you’re not alone. You always have people who care about you and will help you. Don’t forget that, okay?”

“I… I will. Thank you for sharing your story, Mrs. Matsumoto. I needed to hear that,” Chiku smiled, her emotions overwhelmed her as tears streamed from her eyes.

“Here, let me wipe those tears for you,” Misaki said. “There, now you’re swelling with radiance.” They laughed at the bad joke until Chiku started groaning. The Matsumoto women asked what was wrong before they saw the globular woman expand.

“Guys,” Chiku started, “this feels like a big one coming. I think… this is it for me.”

Her breasts bugled out from her sweatshirt. Her butt looked like she stuffed two volleyballs into her pants while her enlarged hips and thighs further emphasized her waddle. But none was hit harder than her stomach. “Not really, but I’m looking for stretchable clothing,” Chiku said.

“Oh, I’m sure we have that in stock. Follow me: by the time you leave, you’ll know your size and have new, comfortable and stylish clothes.” The eager saleswoman grabbed Chiku’s arm and yanked her inside, ignoring the black-haired woman’s complaints.
