Chiku thought it over and wondered what to do. For being as old as she is and retired, she already gets roughly $4,500 a month to live off of. She does have the hundreds of thousands she has save up so what's wrong with a couple hundred extra bucks a week poise benefits do wrong? She agreed and they got her applied. She likes it and wondered if Rin would as well. Looking at herself now, it better be worth it.
155333211123331.title: She gets a call

1553332111233312.content:
With her now in the new maternity program, Chiku knew that she would have a little more to use when needed. In all, she will have nearly $7,000 a month to use. Feeling her belly, she hoped it would be enough for her, the twins and her 15th child to survive off. Lately she's been wondering what Rin's been up to. Lin has been making regular visits to her and was glad she was.

"There you are Rin. Been worried about you." Chiku said.

"Sorry. Just got a little busy with a little job I got." Rin said.

"Didn't know you had one."

"I got one to make some money after seeing how big you are. Can I ask you something."

Rin went in and thought of what to say. Lin knows what he was going ask and was going to help. He asked how she would feel about marrying a boy nearly a century younger than herself? Chiku thought about it and wondered what to say. She could accept and let him move in with her but there could be some backlash. If not, eBay could happen for what they did since Rin in a minor.
1553332111233312.title: Rin asks something

15533321112333121.content:
Chiku made her decision and decided to marry him. Lin liked that and with their mother's help, they got them officially married. This was perfect for their parents had to move to someplace that didn't allow anyone under the age of 20 can't live. Lin moved in with them to help around the house. Even though she was more physically active and youthful now, Chiku was still a 109 year old woman.

"How long do you plan on keeping our child in? Rin asked.

"For more than 375 days. Your mother gave me something to help even needed." Chiku replied.

"Wow, more than a year. If you can live for mouth than a century, I'm sure you can do it. I wonder what I would look like at that age?"

"Wrinkly, raison like and ugly."

Lin punched her brother for that remark. Chiku said she could help her with somethings. She said it was down to genetics, exercise, and diet but not all can relay on that. Do it right and one could live into their 90s like her eldest daughter Rei or longer. Rin can join if he likes but Chiku would focus on Lin.
15533321112333121.title: Chiku accepted his offer

choices: Lin starts a new kind diet
155333211123331211.content:
Things were going well for Chiku and her 'little' family but they were a little concerned. They tried not to worry too much to they knew Chiku was quite strong and could last a couple more months of her pregnancy. Chiku helps with Lin trying to prolong her life but they won't actually know for sure until later in her life. Rin liked how his wife looked not only as she does at he told age but pregnant as well. Eventually the twins turned 15 and liked how things were going.

"Well, I'm off to find a steadier job than doing odd jobs." Rin said.

"I've got to get this one checked out." Chiku said.

"I guess in on my own then." Lin said.

"You're coming with me. Afterwards we're having fun."

Lin wanted a bit uncomfortably for Chiku in the hall while she was checked out. The doctors took her in right away and got right to work. Everything seemed alright with Chiku and her child. Though they are worried about one thing. The problem lies within giving birth. They fear that if she continues on like this, the child could become a bit too big for her to safely and might kill her. She lived a long life so she wasn't worried as long as her child lived. Chiku and Lin left and had some fun. They ran into Rin who was still looking but no one would hire a 15 year old. So he tagged along and enjoyed the day with them. The odd jobs he was doing stopped as well but Chiku wasn't worried. She had plenty it money saved up and gets up to $7,000 a month so they should be good for now. Chiku wasn't all that worried about them being jobs anytime soon.
155333211123331211.title: They check her out

1553332111233312111.content:
Chiku continued to keep her child in her and liked it. Lin and Rin helped wherever needed and liked Chiku's beauty at her age. It wasn't long before the 375 days came and went. She stopped using the stuff the twins mother gave her and let it continue naturally. That brought up the memories of when she was pregnant with Rei. Though she wasn't pregnant with her for over a year but barely 8 months.

"Are you sure you're alright? You look like you could explode." Rin said.

"I'm sure in fine. Speaking of exploding, she's coming." Chiku said.

Birth was easy and Chiku couldn't wait to see her child. She was right about having a girl and was given a 14 pound child. She has the record of the oldest mother to give birth at 109 and longest pregnancy at 14 and a half months. She liked it and hoped for her to have a long life. Chiku named her Mizuki for she was born well into that night and under a beautiful full moon. Rin and Lin like her and would take great care of her. They wonder if she would be able to make more before she dies. If she does before they're of age, Lin would fill in the best she could. That was great for she would be perfect as long as she's able to have a couple of her own.
1553332111233312111.title: Time comes

choices: Lin wants to carry a child
15533321112333121111.content:
Chiku enjoyed her life with Rin and Lin as well as her youngest child Mizuki who was the most wonderful she had so far. The only one she know that comes close to her was Rei. Rei liked seeing her youngest sister even if they were nearly a centery apart. Chiku ensured the twins were going their homework and such before they could have any fun. Despite being nearly 100 years older, Chiku felt Rin was the one for her. Rin felt the same way which annoyed Lin. She was having no luck with finding a boyfriend but was assured that who needs one when she has a brother like Rin.

"I guess you're right about that. I'm heading out for a bit. Don't have too much fun." Lin said.

"What does she mean by that?" Rin asked.

"Simple, this." Chiku said.

Rin jumped at the sound of her voice behind him and where her hand went. She grabbed hold of it when it was hard enough to have some fun. They were alone and Mizuki wouldn't know or remember this. They went at it and Rin had his fun with his wife. For newly 110 years like, Chiku was no frail old woman. Of she could live this long and still bare a child and have it in her for nearly 15 months, she was not what one would seem. She could live for 90 more years with ease.
15533321112333121111.title: They have at it again

choices: Lin wants to carry a child
155333211123331211111.content:
Chiku enjoyed getting it on with Rin and the company Lin provided. Both did their best in school and Chiku ensured they had the best life she could. She has more knowledge a mother could have raising children like the twins and young ones like Mizuki for she now has 15 and countless grandchildren and a handful of great-grandchildren. She can tell Rin could pump more into her and she'll gladly birth them all.

"Rin, there is something I have to tell you." Chiku said.

"Can it wait a bit, I have to get this done." Rin said.

"I guess me and Mizuki will take her new sibling to Lin."

Rin turned around to catch a side view of his wife's growing belly. He can tell that she was pregnant again. He liked it and Lin soon found out. They liked it and hoped Chiku could bare another one. If she can love for 110 years and birth 15 children as well as see all of her grandchildren be raised right and both of her first couple great-grandchildren, then she cold have her 16th child. Rin was now getting concerned for impregnating such a woman like her twice at such a young age. The again, there was nothing to really worry about with her.
155333211123331211111.title: Chiku tells him the news

1553332133.content: What else could there be for her?
1553332133.title: Something else

15533322.content: Why does Chiku start fattening up now?
15533322.title: Weight gain

choices: Chiku hits up a couple fast food places
155333221.content:
Chiku-Ne Yokoyaman was more than just any other elderly woman. She was well over 100 years old and still going. She looks great for her age and is at 120 years old. She eats regularly and keeps active for as long as possible. She has been on record for her age and how she does it. There was one thing she never was in her entire life, over weight. Now at 120, what's the problem not doing so. She's actually quite curious about how it feels and what it's like to be fat.

"You're really want to fatten up?" one of her great grandchildren asked.

"Of course. I have been thinking about it for a couple years now and to make my favorite great-granddaughter feel comfortable around me." Chiku said.

"That definitely would make me feel good."

Her great-granddaughter was a large girl weighing in at 300 pounds. Her name was Mei and was quite a lovely girl. She loves being around her great-grandmother due to how she treats her. Mei was in her 20s and still single but didn't care. She was a shrine maiden and would regularly check on Chiku on her way to work, during work and after work. The shrine she works at isn't too much and even enjoys Mei's large size. They have plenty of food and even keep an eye on Chiku when Mei couldn't.
155333221.title: Curiosity

choices: Chiku goes out to a few places
1553332211.content:
Chiku started to eat more and more each day and enjoyed it. She wasn't showing much of a pound extra which she didn't mind. It was fairly early on still so it was expected. She was enjoying it no matter what and Mei was liking it as well. By her prediction, Chiku would be dead by the time she starts actually fattening up. That got her thinking. If at the pace she's doing it wont work right away, why not each meal be large to begin with. So she decided to make a large feast for her great-grandmother. It took her a while before the whole thing was done.

"Come and get it Chiku." Mei said.

"This all looks great. Are you going to eat any?" Chiku asked.

"I would but I want you to enjoy it first."

Chiku began eating and enjoyed the food. She was unaware that there was more food and would be taking it all with ease. When she finished this batch of food, Mei brought out more and more. Chiku liked it and how her great-granddaughters food tastes. When she couldn't eat anymore, Mei stuffed her some more before finishing off the rest. This was great feast and Mei would be making more of it.
1553332211.title: Mei makes a feast

15533322113.content:
Mei continued to make plenty for her great-grandmother and liked it. Chiku ate away and liked the food her great-granddaughter made. She was liking how things were going and slowly fattening up. Now that its been 3 months since Mei made the first large feast and makes them 2 to 3 times a week. Looking at Chiku, Mei was feeling better about being so fat herself.

"You're up early, Mei. Alright there?" Chiku asked.

"Im alright. Just couldn't sleep." Mei said.

"Ok. Want to come with me, I'm heading out to visit a buffet."

"Might as well fill up."

They went out and enjoyed themselves. Seeing Chiku filling out as she is, she was starting to look younger and more lovely. Chiku said that when she was younger, they didn't have plentiful of food. She didn't know why she waited nearly a century before starting to fatten up. Mei hoped her great-grandmother doesn't go too far. She mentioned that if someone fattens up too much or over eats at once or in a short amount of time, they could explode. Though there was no real evidence on that so there shouldn't be much of a worry. They got to the buffet and filled up a couple plates. They ate away and loved it. The food was too good that they couldn't stop eating until they felt like their bellies were going to burst. They left and thought of something strange. They could both fatten up for their own pleasure no matter what people may think. Though Mei was already fairly big and a bit of an unfair head start on her ancestor.
15533322113.title: A couople months later

155333223332.content: Why does a century old Chiku fatten up for a job?
155333223332.title: Job

choices: Chiku gets her first weigh in
1553332233321.content:
Chiku-Ne Nakanome lived a long and wonderful life but lately she's been struggling a bit. The problem wasn't her age or health despite recently turning 100. She is as healthy and mentally sharp as can be. The thing was that she managed to out live her savings and pension. She still gets a pension but lately that was barely making due. So it was time for her to get back into the work force. Though she wouldn't be easily done for who would hire a century old woman.

"There is no choice. I have to do it." Chiku said.

She looked around to see who would hire her. There wasn't anyone who would but soon found something. There was a little store that would hire her. It wouldn't be too much work for someone like her and she applied. They accepted her and brought her in for an interview. The place was more than just a store in the normal sense. In the back were human cattle. Each girl there was selected as such or former employees.

"This is a bit off but interesting." Chiku said.

"It is but there is a bit of a legal market we cater to. Since you meet the requirements and criteria for the front store, you'll be slowly fattened up before being slaughtered." The owner said.

"What's the pay like?"

"You'll be paid $17 an hour plus a monthly bonus based on your weight at the end."

Chiku liked that and started that day. She was given her uniform and got to work. The people that already there liked it and knew she could keep up. The day went by with a breeze and she knew that this would be great. One thing she liked was how wonderfully the girls in the store are. The ones in back sparked her motherly and grandmotherly instincts to take care of. There were no males working there for it was for the encouragement of plus sized women on top of selling human meat.
1553332233321.title: Out lived her savings

1553332331.content: How does she inflate herself?
1553332331.title: Inflation

15533323312.content: How or why does the century old Chiku fill herself up with water?
15533323312.title: Water

155333233122.content:
When people think of elderly women past the age of 80, they think of women that are a bit wrinkly, mentally going, incapable of taking car of themselves to being still relatively sharp minded, active and looking for assistance. But not one century old woman. Her name is Chiku-Ne Yokoyaman. She was born in 1920 and is currently living quite well for being 100 years old. She is mentally as sharp as a kid, healthy as can be and is more than capable of working like usual. Despite her age, she barely looks like she could pass for being in her 60s. Chiku had 4 children, 3 girls and a boy who grew up to have a combined total of 12 grandchildren for her and soon to have her third great-grandchild. What some haven't realized about Chiku was that she was into body inflation. Though she didn't know if her old body could actually take such stress.

"No matter, I might die tomorrow for all I care about." Chiku said.

She had no actual reason to do so and went out back to try. She put her garden hose into her mouth and started the water. It came rushing down the hose and into her mouth before flowing down into her belly. It felt nice on a day like this and she chugged along. Chiku went into a state of bliss as the water came unaware that she might actually pop herself on her first go. It didn't matter to the old woman as she drank and soon felt her belly pushing out. It was a wonderful feeling to have and knew she could take it before she dies. She stopped the water before she got too big and liked how she looked.

"A start. Brings me back to when I was pregnant with the kids." Chiku said.

She went inside and wondered what they were all up to. They would be possibly busy, or in the case of her son and eldest child, not remember who she was. She just got settled in and wondered how big she could get herself and if her old body could take it.
155333233122.title: Just because

choices: She finds a bit of a pay from this
1553332331223.content:
Chiku liked how it feels to have a belly full of water and how big she looks. She could easily pull of being pregnant again at this look. This was good and that evening, she decided to do it again. She went out and put the hose into her mouth again. The water came down and every second made her bigger and bigger. The weight began to get a bit much for the elderly Chiku but she was quite strong for her old age. It was nice but she would need help later on.

"Keep coming. I want to be massive." Chiku thought.

The water kept coming more and more with every drop of water that came. She didn't have any neighbors that would mind for she knew that the only one she has was actually an inflationist herself. If she came out and saw this, she would help. It was good and she hoped for the best. When she couldn't get any bigger, she stopped the water. Her belly doubled in size and more than tripled in size.

"This is more like it. Bigger I'll become in time." Chiku said.

She went back inside and relaxed some more. She wondered if this was safe for someone to do. It apparently was safe and she was perfectly fine. Though she would become too big and possibly pop. For now, she was good and liked the feel of this.
1553332331223.title: Chiku pushes herself bigger

1553332332.content: What does the centennial transform into?
1553332332.title: Transformation
